books.title: Neural Networks and Deep Learning
books.description: Free online book providing intuitive explanations of neural networks and deep learning concepts.
specificChapters: Chapter 1: Using neural nets to recognize handwritten digits

Chapter 10: Sequence Modeling: Recurrent and Recursive Nets
